text:
I was thinking something like this, using eval
```function test() 
    array = zeros(15)
    @eval $(:hello) = view(array, 1:5)
    #hello = view(array, 1:5)
    hello[1] = 10
    println(array)  # dosnt actually modify array
end```
but it dosn't actually modify the array

edit: nevermind I needed to use `$` for both RHS and LHS of `@eval`
